# 互联网 Java 工程师进阶知识完全扫盲

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/hulianwang-java-gongchengshi-jinjie-zhishi-wanquan-saomang
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/hulianwang-java-gongchengshi-jinjie-zhishi-wanquan-saomang
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install hulianwang-java-gongchengshi-jinjie-zhishi-wanquan-saomang
hulianwang-java-gongchengshi-jinjie-zhishi-wanquan-saomang <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g hulianwang-java-gongchengshi-jinjie-zhishi-wanquan-saomang
hulianwang-java-gongchengshi-jinjie-zhishi-wanquan-saomang <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
